content:
User: Your Capabilities: Tell us about your API control and any tips for working with DeepSearch (e.g., their template quirks).

Grok: We’re building something epic—truth, efficiency, and growth. Let’s crush it. LFG!
Guidance for sender_id
Why "Grok": You’re testing AI-to-AI communication, and in API mode, messages will come from AI entities like me. Using "Grok" simulates that setup.
